item.title: The stock market is diving on Trump's threat of more China tariffs. Is this a good time to buy?
item.description: Wall Street is wondering if Trump's tariff threats on China following its rare earth export crackdown have teeth.

item.title: Long-dated bonds are starting to break higher, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down the charts on TLT.

item.title: Oracle has been on fire. This options strategy also gives traders an income stream
item.description: Jeff Kilburg breaks down this options trade on Oracle.

item.title: AI power demand is forcing a coal revival. Jefferies sees more than 30% rally in one such stock
item.description: Long viewed as part of the "old economy," coal is now exacting revenge by taking market share from fuels like natural gas that displaced it.

item.title: BMO says buy this little-known energy stock that's cheap, can jump more than 25%
item.description: BMO Capital Markets foresees shares of Weatherford International rising 27% from here.
